solution_line_template: The tree has been planted for {lydia_current_age} - {lydia_age_when_planted} = <<{lydia_current_age}-{lydia_age_when_planted}={years_since_planted}>>{years_since_planted} years
It will take another {years_to_bear_fruit} - {years_since_planted} = <<{years_to_bear_fruit}-{years_since_planted}={years_remaining}>>{years_remaining} years for it to bear fruit
